product_name: Patagonia Micro Puff Hoodie Jacket - Men's - 2013
long_description: From the crags to the ski slopes, the men's PrimaLoft(R)-insulated Patagonia Micro Puff Hoodie Jacket comfortably outfits you for wet and frigid days. Efficient PrimaLoft(R) Sport high-loft polyester insulation provides excellent warmth and compressibility. Wind-blocking, moisture-shedding, recycled ripstop polyester shell glides effortlessly whether worn as a mid or outer layer. Single-pull hood adjustment controls volume and improves visibility; hood fits snugly over a helmet. Articulated elbows move with you. Full-length front zipper is backed with a stormflap. Interior zippered pocket for small items; zippered handwarmer pockets. Gasket cuffs and a drawcord hem keep the cold out. Includes a stuff sack for stowing the men's Patagonia Micro Puff Hoodie Jacket in your pack.
